mainObjective: Uncover the hidden shrine within the Ruins of Calamyr and recover the relic guarded by Queen Seralyth’s spirit.

plotPoints.title: Murmurs in the Moor
plotPoints.description: The party arrives at the Ruins of Calamyr, where rumors swirl of strange lights and haunting whispers within the Ruins of Calamyr. Mira the Moorwise, an enigmatic guide, offers to lead the party through the treacherous moors, but warns of restless spirits and rival treasure seekers. Old Fenrick, a superstitious hermit, may provide cryptic insight about a hidden shrine if convinced to trust the party.
plotPoints.plotImpact: Introduces the location and key NPCs. Player choices in gaining Fenrick’s trust or negotiating with Mira influence the information and advantages available for later encounters.

sideQuests.title: The Hermit's Secret
sideQuests.description: Old Fenrick is haunted by visions of the Riverbound spirit, Rilith. If convinced to trust the party, Fenrick will reveal the existence of a pathway to the hidden shrine and warn of spectral dangers.
sideQuests.plotImpact: Unlocks a safer route through the moors, reducing hazards in the next plot point.

sideQuests.title: The Moorwise’s Bargain
sideQuests.description: Mira the Moorwise offers to guide the party in exchange for help cleansing a corrupted willow grove. Completing this task earns her favor and local knowledge.
sideQuests.plotImpact: Provides a magical token for use against moor spirits or rival explorers.

plotPoints.title: The Whispering Riverbanks
plotPoints.description: Guided by clues and the local guides, the party navigates the Whispering Riverbanks. They must contend with supernatural phenomena – ethereal whispers, illusions, and vengeful spirits. A rival expedition led by Professor Halvane is also searching for the shrine, setting up tense encounters or possible alliances.
plotPoints.plotImpact: Choices in dealing with rivals and spirits affect future enemy strength, available allies, and potential complications.

sideQuests.title: Echoes of Regret
sideQuests.description: The tormented spirit Rilith haunts the banks, seeking resolution for past wrongs. Helping Rilith find peace can lessen the river’s supernatural dangers.
sideQuests.plotImpact: Reduces the number or severity of spirit encounters in the shrine.

sideQuests.title: Rivalry or Alliance
sideQuests.description: Professor Halvane and his mercenaries offer the chance for uneasy alliance or competition. Negotiation, sabotage, or cooperation each have consequences for the race to the shrine.
sideQuests.plotImpact: Potentially gains an ally or creates an additional adversary in the shrine area.

plotPoints.title: The Shrine’s Threshold
plotPoints.description: The party reaches the hidden shrine, a half-submerged ruin overgrown with willows. Powerful wards and puzzles bar entry, left by the Riverbound Circle. Inside, ancient spirits and magical traps guard the relic. The approach may be contested by Halvane’s group or haunted by the spirit of Rilith if left unresolved.
plotPoints.plotImpact: Player choices in exploration, puzzle-solving, and handling hostile presences determine their preparedness for the final confrontation.

sideQuests.title: Riverbound Rituals
sideQuests.description: Sister Amara requests the party perform a cleansing ritual to appease the ancient guardians within the shrine. Success may calm the spirits and weaken Queen Seralyth’s influence.
sideQuests.plotImpact: Lowers the difficulty of the final battle or grants a boon.

sideQuests.title: The Blue Flame’s Secret
sideQuests.description: Dren of the Blue Flame offers hidden knowledge in exchange for assistance escaping from the Hollow Host’s pursuit. Freeing Dren uncovers a hidden passage or vital secret within the shrine.
sideQuests.plotImpact: Provides a shortcut or secret information about the relic’s defenses.

plotPoints.title: Queen Seralyth’s Judgment
plotPoints.description: Within the heart of the shrine, the party faces Queen Seralyth’s cursed spirit. Seralyth challenges them through a mix of combat, negotiation, and trials of will, testing their intentions and the choices made throughout the adventure. The outcome will shape the fate of the relic and the spirits bound to the river.
plotPoints.plotImpact: The players’ actions determine whether Seralyth is appeased, banished, or remains a vengeful force, and who ultimately claims the relic. Choices ripple out to the wider region.

sideQuests.title: The Cursed Coronation
sideQuests.description: A hidden chamber reveals Seralyth’s crown, the key to freeing or binding her spirit. Deciding the crown’s fate dramatically alters the endgame.
sideQuests.plotImpact: Can end the confrontation peacefully or grant access to unique rewards.
